main event: A saucer shaped object, about the size of a silver dollar, was seen in Bradford, Rhode Island on 7 April 1966.
interesting points: The object was initially stationary before moving from east to southeast.,It contained three blinking lights.,The observer used a 50 power telescope for the sighting.,The sighting lasted approximately 10 minutes.,The area is frequently traversed by civilian and military aircraft.
sighted object: saucer shaped object with three blinking lights
